tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up an Oracle Kubernetes Engine instance on the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Lab 2: Install the WebLogic Server Kubernetes Operator
Lab 3: Install a Traefik software load balancer
Lab 6 (OPTIONAL): Update a deployed application by a roll restart of the new image
Lab 7 (OPTIONAL): Assign WebLogic pods to nodes (simulation a cluster span across 2 data centers)
